businessSummary.oneLiner: Southeast Asia's largest e-commerce (Shopee), digital entertainment (Garena/Free Fire), and fintech (Monee) operator ‚Äî Singapore-based global internet company
businessSummary.description: Sea Limited is a Singapore-headquartered global tech company operating e-commerce (Shopee), gaming (Garena), and digital financial services (Monee) across Southeast Asia, Latin America, and Taiwan. TTM revenue $21.04B (+35.8% YoY), net income $1.42B ‚Äî a full profitability turnaround. On 2/19, expanded a strategic AI partnership MOU with Google. Shares closed at $110.90 on 2/26, up +6.15%. Q4 2025 earnings due 3/3. Barclays maintains Buy.
howTheyMakeMoney: Shopee: E-commerce fees, advertising, logistics (SPX Express) ‚Äî Q3 2025 revenue $3.8B (+36.6% YoY)
Garena: Free Fire in-game sales, publishing ‚Äî Q3 2025 revenue $653M (+31.2%), bookings $775M (+51%)
Monee (fka SeaMoney): Digital payments, lending, banking, insurance ‚Äî Q3 2025 revenue $990M (+60.8%)
keyProducts: Shopee ‚Äî #1 e-commerce in SE Asia & LatAm (2024 SE Asia GMV 52%)
Garena Free Fire ‚Äî Global mobile battle royale (bookings +51% YoY)
Monee/ShopeePay ‚Äî Digital payments & financial services (loan book $7.9B, +70%)
SeaBank ‚Äî Digital banking in Indonesia & Philippines

keyMetrics.name: P/E (TTM)
keyMetrics.interpretation: Based on $2.29 EPS. Reasonable for high-growth emerging tech

keyMetrics.name: Forward P/E
keyMetrics.interpretation: Based on FY2026 EPS $4.27 estimate. Attractive for the growth rate

keyMetrics.name: Revenue Growth
keyMetrics.interpretation: 3 consecutive quarters of 30%+ growth. Q4 results due 3/3

keyMetrics.name: Operating Margin
keyMetrics.interpretation: Improving trend post-turnaround. Scale economies emerging

keyMetrics.name: PEG
keyMetrics.interpretation: Significantly undervalued relative to growth rate

growthDrivers.title: Shopee SE Asia GMV 52% ‚Äî dominant #1 expanding
growthDrivers.description: 2024 SE Asia GMV share 52% (up from 48%, +4pp). Shopee captured $12B of $14B new GMV. Q3 2025 GMV $32.2B (+28%), 5th consecutive all-time high.

growthDrivers.title: Google AI strategic partnership ‚Äî Agentic Shopping, AP2 payments
growthDrivers.description: Expanded MOU with Google on 2/19. Shopee: Gemini-based Agentic Shopping prototype. Garena: AI game development. Monee: Agent Payments Protocol (AP2) adoption.

growthDrivers.title: Monee (fintech) hypergrowth ‚Äî Off-Shopee SPayLater +300%
growthDrivers.description: Q3 revenue +60.8%, loan book $7.9B (+70%), NPL 1.1% stable. Off-Shopee SPayLater +300% YoY ‚Äî evolving into independent fintech platform.

growthDrivers.title: Q4 earnings 3/3 ‚Äî growth momentum catalyst
growthDrivers.description: Before market open 3/3. Third consecutive quarter of 30%+ growth could trigger valuation re-rating. Barclays maintains Buy.

competitiveAdvantage.summary: Integrated SE Asian e-commerce, gaming, and fintech ecosystem is the core moat. Shopee-Monee-Garena cross-synergies and proprietary logistics (SPX Express) create barriers. GMV 52% vs. #2 TikTok Shop (~18%).

moats.description: Shopee's two-sided buyer-seller network and SPX Express logistics. 2024 SE Asia GMV 52%.
Language, payments, logistics, and regulatory optimization across 11 SE Asian markets. Strong local edge vs. Temu, Amazon.
Integrated e-commerce, payments, lending, and gaming data for AI personalization. Enhanced by Google AI partnership.

competitors.name: TikTok Shop
competitors.detail: SE Asia e-commerce #2, GMV ~18%. Strong in live commerce.

competitors.name: Lazada (Alibaba)
competitors.detail: Fallen to SE Asia #3. Overtaken by TikTok Shop.

competitors.name: Temu (PDD Holdings)
competitors.detail: Ultra-low-price cross-border. Entering SE Asia and Brazil. MAU +55%.

competitors.name: MercadoLibre
competitors.detail: LatAm #1 e-commerce and fintech. Direct Shopee competitor in Brazil.

competitors.name: Grab Holdings
competitors.detail: SE Asian super app. Indirect fintech competition with Monee.

recentNews.headline: SE rallies +6.15% to $110.90
recentNews.significance: Strong rebound from recent downtrend. Anticipation ahead of Q4 earnings (3/3).

recentNews.headline: Barclays maintains Buy, target $226
recentNews.significance: +104% upside from current levels. Positive assessment of Shopee growth momentum.

recentNews.headline: Expanded strategic AI partnership MOU with Google
recentNews.significance: Agentic Shopping, AI game development, AP2 payments protocol. AI innovation across all 3 business lines.

recentNews.headline: Simply Wall St: Google AI partnership vs. mixed share performance
recentNews.significance: High growth potential but recent share price weakness analyzed.

recentNews.headline: Q4 2025 earnings due (before market open)
recentNews.significance: Whether 3 consecutive quarters of 30%+ growth continues is the key question. Potential re-rating catalyst.

analystOpinions.notableComment: Strong Buy consensus among 12 analysts. Barclays $226 (+104%), Wedbush $170 (+53%). Even the lowest target of $144 is +30% above current price. BofA lowered to $182 from $200 but still +64%.

risks.title: 27% below 52-week high ‚Äî weakening momentum
risks.description: Down 27% from $152 high. Below 200-day SMA of $152. Persistent downtrend risk.

risks.title: Temu's aggressive SE Asia and Brazil expansion
risks.description: Temu MAU surging +55%. Ultra-low-price cross-border strategy could erode Shopee's budget categories.

risks.title: Credit risk from Monee lending growth
risks.description: Loan book $7.9B (+70%). NPL at 1.1% is stable, but could spike in economic downturn.

risks.title: Short interest 6.0% ‚Äî elevated bearish sentiment
risks.description: 6% of float sold short. Reflects weakened market sentiment.

risks.title: SE Asian FX risk
risks.description: Majority of revenue in local SE Asian currencies. USD strength reduces translated revenue.

buyReasons.title: PEG 0.41 ‚Äî significantly undervalued for growth rate
buyReasons.rationale: Forward P/E 26x with 36% revenue growth. PEG 0.41 is among the lowest for growth stocks. Substantial valuation gap.

buyReasons.title: Google AI partnership ‚Äî upgrading all 3 business lines
buyReasons.rationale: Agentic Shopping, AI gaming, AP2 payments. Technical competitiveness upgraded across the board.

buyReasons.title: Shopee GMV 52% ‚Äî expanding SE Asian dominance
buyReasons.rationale: Gained +4pp share in 2024. Captured $12B of $14B new GMV. Network effects strengthening.

buyReasons.title: Q4 earnings (3/3) ‚Äî growth confirmation catalyst
buyReasons.rationale: If 30%+ growth continues for 3rd straight quarter, re-rating likely. Consensus target $189 (+71%).

overallOpinion: Sea Limited shows strong growth across all three verticals ‚Äî Shopee (GMV 52%), Monee (+60.8%), and Garena (+51%) ‚Äî while strengthening technical competitiveness through the Google AI partnership.
PEG 0.41 and Forward P/E 26x are remarkably cheap for a 36% growth company. The consensus target of $189 (+71%) offers the largest upside among the covered stocks.
The key catalyst is the 3/3 Q4 earnings release. Confirmation of 30%+ growth should trigger a valuation re-rating, but Temu competition and downtrend reversal are needed.
